products.title: Kanchipuram Silk Saree
products.history: Handwoven by artisans from Kanchipuram using traditional silk weaving methods.

products.title: Ikat Dupatta
products.history: Ikat fabrics are created using a resist dyeing technique on warp and weft yarns.

products.title: Banarasi Handloom Saree
products.description: Elegant handwoven silk saree with intricate zari work.
products.history: Banarasi sarees are inspired by Mughal art and known for their zari brocade.

products.title: Kalamkari Cotton Dupatta
products.description: Hand-painted Kalamkari dupatta made using natural dyes.
products.history: Kalamkari is an ancient pen-art textile craft.

products.title: Assam Muga Silk Fabric
products.history: Muga silk is unique to Assam and known for its natural golden sheen.

products.title: Pochampally Ikat Saree
products.history: Ikat patterns are created using tie-and-dye warp and weft yarns.

products.title: Jamdani Handloom Saree
products.history: Jamdani weaving dates back to Mughal Bengal.

products.title: Kota Doria Saree
products.history: Kota Doria features the iconic 'khats' square weave.

products.title: Chanderi Silk Dupatta
products.description: Soft silk dupatta with zari work.
products.history: Chanderi weaving is known for its sheer texture and glossy finish.

products.title: Tussar Silk Fabric
products.history: Tussar silk is produced from wild silkworms.

products.title: Ajrakh Printed Dupatta
products.history: Ajrakh is a centuries-old hand block printing art.

products.title: Maheshwari Silk Saree
products.description: Classic Maheshwari saree with zari pallu.
products.history: Maheshwari sarees were developed under Maharani Ahilyabai Holkar.

products.title: Kullu Wool Shawl
products.history: Kullu shawls are famous for their colorful geometric borders.

products.title: Patan Patola Saree
products.description: Premium handloom double Ikat Patola saree.
products.history: Patola is a rare double Ikat weaving tradition.

products.title: Batik Printed Dupatta
products.history: Batik dyeing is an ancient wax-resist art technique.

products.title: Ilkal Cotton Silk Saree
products.description: Traditional Ilkal saree with red pallu.
products.history: Ilkal weaving uses a unique thread-joining technique.
